00027 #ifndef USB_LIBUSB10
00028 #define USB_LIBUSB10
00029 
00030 #include <libusb.h>
00031 
00032 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00033 /*
00034   From Github Issue 22 by Roefer -
00035   https://github.com/OpenKinect/libfreenect/issues/#issue/22
00036 
00037   The current implementation still does not reach 30 Hz on MacOS. This
00038   is due to bad scheduling of USB transfers in libusb (Ed Note: libusb
00039   1.0.8). A fix can be found at
00040   http://www.informatik.uni-bremen.de/~roefer/libusb/libusb-osx-kinect.diff
00041 
00042   (Ed Note: patch applies to libusb repo at 7da756e09fd)
00043 
00044   In camera.c, I use PKTS_PER_XFER = 128, NUM_XFERS = 4. There are a
00045   few rules: PKTS_PER_XFER * NUM_XFERS <= 1000, PKTS_PER_XFER % 8 == 0.
00046 */
00047 #define PKTS_PER_XFER 128
00048 #define NUM_XFERS 4
00049 #define DEPTH_PKTBUF 2048
00050 #define RGB_PKTBUF 2048
00051 #else
00052 #define PKTS_PER_XFER 16
00053 #define NUM_XFERS 16
00054 #define DEPTH_PKTBUF 1920
00055 #define RGB_PKTBUF 1920
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 
00059 typedef struct {
00060         libusb_context *ctx;
00061         int should_free_ctx;
00062 } fnusb_ctx;
00063 
00064 typedef struct {
00065         freenect_device *parent; //so we can go up from the libusb userdata
00066         libusb_device_handle *dev;
00067 } fnusb_dev;
00068 
00069 typedef struct {
00070         fnusb_dev *parent; //so we can go up from the libusb userdata
00071         struct libusb_transfer **xfers;
00072         uint8_t *buffer;
00073         fnusb_iso_cb cb;
00074         int num_xfers;
00075         int pkts;
00076         int len;
00077 } fnusb_isoc_stream;
00078 
00079 int fnusb_init(fnusb_ctx *ctx, freenect_usb_context *usb_ctx);
00080 int fnusb_shutdown(fnusb_ctx *ctx);
00081 int fnusb_process_events(fnusb_ctx *ctx);
00082 
00083 int fnusb_open_subdevices(freenect_device *dev, int index);
00084 
00085 int fnusb_start_iso(fnusb_dev *dev, fnusb_isoc_stream *strm, fnusb_iso_cb cb, int ep, int xfers, int pkts, int len);
00086 int fnusb_stop_iso(fnusb_dev *dev, fnusb_isoc_stream *strm);
00087 
00088 int fnusb_control(fnusb_dev *dev, uint8_t bmRequestType, uint8_t bRequest, uint16_t wValue, uint16_t wIndex, uint8_t *data, uint16_t wLength);
00089 
00090 
00091 #endif
